targets.query:
from(bucket: "${influxbucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._field == "value" and
    r.hostname == "${hostname}" and
    r.metric == "summary::ifw_updates::count"
  )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field: r.metric }))

from(bucket: "${influxbucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r.hostname == "${hostname}" and
    (r._field == "warn" or r._field == "crit") and
    r.metric == "summary::ifw_updates::count"
  )
  |> sort()
  |> unique(column: "_field")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field: r._field }))

from(bucket: "${influxbucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._field == "value" and
    r.hostname == "${hostname}" and
    r.metric == "defender::ifw_updates::count"
  )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field: r.metric }))

  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)

  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._field == "value" and
    r.hostname == "${hostname}" and
    (r.metric =~ /^(${cpucores}::ifw_cpu::load)/)
  )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field: r.metric }))

list.definition:
from(bucket: "${influxbucket}")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r.metric =~ /::ifw_/
  )
  |> keyValues(keyColumns: ["hostname"])
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])
  |> unique(column: "_value")
list.description: The Icinga hostname to display data for
list.label: Hostname
list.name: hostname
list.query:
from(bucket: "${influxbucket}")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r.metric =~ /::ifw_/
  )
  |> keyValues(keyColumns: ["hostname"])
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])
  |> unique(column: "_value")

list.description: Data Bucket for InfluxDB2 for Icinga monitoring data
list.label: Icinga Data
list.name: influxbucket

list.definition:
from(bucket: "${influxbucket}")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r.hostname == "${hostname}"
  )
  |> keyValues(keyColumns: ["_measurement"])
  |> keep(columns: ["service"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value:r.service }))
  |> unique(column: "_value")
list.description: The Icinga service to display data for
list.label: Service
list.name: service
list.query:
from(bucket: "${influxbucket}")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r.hostname == "${hostname}"
  )
  |> keyValues(keyColumns: ["_measurement"])
  |> keep(columns: ["service"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value:r.service }))
  |> unique(column: "_value")

list.definition:
from(bucket: "${influxbucket}")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r.hostname == "${hostname}" and
    r._field == "value" and
    r.metric =~ /^(.*?)::ifw_cpu::load/
  )
  |> keyValues(keyColumns: ["metric"])
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])
  |> unique(column: "_value")
list.name: cpucores
